title: The Dark Avenger's Sidekick
description: The nameless girl does not know who or what she is. She does not even know her name. But she quickly learns that she has enemies who are trying to kill her, as well as lethal skills that no girl her age should know. And, she inadvertently discovers, she can also fly.Her only clue to her identity is the mysterious, shape-changing ring on her finger that appears to be alive.
author: John C. Wright
